techmeme.title: AMD agrees to buy Helsinki-based Silo AI, which offers tailored AI models and platforms to enterprise customers, for $665M in cash; Silo has a 300-person team (Financial Times)
Samsung Galaxy Z Fold6 and Z Flip6 hands-on: new cameras are great, expanded Galaxy AI features, 12GB of RAM, and stronger frames, but both cost $100 more (Sam Rutherford/Engadget)
Intuit plans to cut ~10% of its global workforce, or ~1,800 employees, and rehire the same number of staff, primarily in engineering, product, and sales (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
Google updates Gemini for Android to work better with foldables, expands Circle to Search, and more; the Galaxy Watch7 and Watch Ultra will ship with Wear OS 5 (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Samsung hikes the Galaxy Z Flip6 and Z Fold6 by $100 to $1,099+ and $1,899, respectively, aiming to reclaim the lead in foldables as Chinese competition mounts (Yoolim Lee/Bloomberg)
